title: Baked Spicy Ranch Chicken Fingers with Honey Mustard.

instructions: ['1. Add the chicken to a gallon size zip top bag. Pour the buttermilk over the chicken. Toss well to coat.', '2. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment.', '3. Add the corn flake crumbs, flour, parsley, chives, dill, garlic powder, onion powder, cayenne pepper, and a pinch each of pepper to a medium sized bowl. Stir to combine.', '4. Remove each piece of chicken from the buttermilk, and dredge through the crumbs, pressing gently to adhere. Place on the prepared baking sheet. Repeat until all the chicken has been used. Make sure not to crowd your pan, if necessary use two baking sheets. Lightly brush/drizzle the chicken with olive oil. Transfer to the oven and bake for 15-20 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through.', '5. Meanwhile, make the honey mustard sauce. Combine all ingredients in a glass jar and shake or whisk until smooth and creamy.', '6. Serve the chicken topped with flaky salt, fresh chives and honey mustard for dipping. Enjoy!']

title: Cauliflower Al Pastor Quesadilla with Lime Smashed Avocado.
ingredients: ['garlic, minced or grated', 'chili powder', 'smoked paprika', 'chipotle peppers in adobo', 'pineapple juice', 'apple cider or white vinegar', 'fresh pineapple chunks, plus additional pineapple chunks for serving', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'cauliflower, cut into florets', 'of a yellow onion, thinly sliced', 'jalapeño, seeded and diced', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'whole wheat or regular flour tortillas', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese', 'shredded pepper jack cheese', 'extra virgin olive oil, for cooking', 'avocados, mashed', 'juice and zest of 1 lime', 'Maldon sea salt']
ingredients with measurement: {'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'chili powder': '2', 'smoked paprika': '2', 'chipotle peppers in adobo': '2', 'pineapple juice': '1/2', 'apple cider or white vinegar': '¼', 'fresh pineapple chunks, plus additional pineapple chunks for serving': '2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'cauliflower, cut into florets': '1', 'of a yellow onion, thinly sliced': '½', 'jalapeño, seeded and diced': '1', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/2', 'whole wheat or regular flour tortillas': '4', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese': '1/2', 'shredded pepper jack cheese': '1/2', 'extra virgin olive oil, for cooking': 'seasoning', 'avocados, mashed': '2', 'juice and zest of 1 lime': 'seasoning', 'Maldon sea salt': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In a blender or food processor combine the garlic, chili powder, paprika, chipotle chilies, pineapple juice, vinegar and 1 cup of the pineapple chunks. Blend until completely smooth.', '2. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the cauliflower, onions, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Cook for 12-15 minutes or until the cauliflower is tender and the onions have caramelized. Reduce the heat to low stir in the pineapple sauce, the remaining cup of pineapple chunks and the jalapeño. Simmer for 8-10 minutes or until the sauce has reduced and coats the cauliflower, there will still be sauce left in the pan. Remove from the heat and stir in the cilantro.', '3. Meanwhile, stir together the avocado, lime juice and zest, and a pinch of salt.', '4. Lay the tortillas flat on a clean counter. On top of 2 tortillas, evenly layer the cheeses and cauliflower, then lay the remaining 2 tortillas on top.', '5. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, place the quesadillas, one at a time, in the skillet and cook until golden on each side, about 4-5 minutes per side. Serve topped with avocado and grilled pineapple.']

title: Garlic Butter Creamed Spinach Salmon.
ingredients: ['salmon filets, skin on or off', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'salted butter', 'shallot, thinly sliced', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'canned full-fat coconut milk, or heavy cream', 'cream cheese, cubed', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'fresh baby spinach', 'juice from 1 lemon', 'chopped fresh parsley', 'chopped fresh chives, plus more for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'salmon filets, skin on or off': '4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'salted butter': '2', 'shallot, thinly sliced': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '3', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1/2', 'canned full-fat coconut milk, or heavy cream': '1', 'cream cheese, cubed': '2', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/2', 'fresh baby spinach': '4', 'juice from 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'chopped fresh parsley': '2', 'chopped fresh chives, plus more for serving': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Season the salmon all over with salt and pepper.', '2. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the salmon, skin side down and cook for 2-3 minutes, until the salmon is crisp. Gently flip, and continue cooking the salmon for another 2-3 minutes, or until the salmon is cooked to your liking. Remove from the skillet. If desired, peel away the skin and discard.', '3. To the same skillet, add the butter, shallots, and garlic and cook until the garlic is fragrant, about 2 minutes. Add the crushed red pepper flakes, coconut milk, and cream cheese. Season the sauce with salt and pepper. Bring to a simmer over medium heat, stirring constantly until smooth and creamy. Add the parmesan, and spinach and cook until the spinach is wilted, about 3-5 minutes. Stir in the lemon juice, parsley, and chives. Remove from the heat and slide the salmon back into the sauce.', '4. To serve plate each piece of salmon, then spoon the sauce over top. Serve with additional herbs.']

title: 30 Minute Chicken Fajitas with Charred Pineapple Salsa Verde

title: Caprese Pesto Pasta Bake
ingredients: ['cherry tomatoes', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'garlic minced or grated', 'fresh chopped herbs, such as thyme or oregano', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'short cut pasta', 'basil pesto, homemade or store-bought', 'fresh baby spinach', 'shredded or torn mozzarella or burrata cheese', 'thinly sliced prosciutto', 'fresh basil, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'cherry tomatoes': '3', 'extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'garlic minced or grated': '2', 'fresh chopped herbs, such as thyme or oregano': '1/3', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'short cut pasta': '1', 'basil pesto, homemade or store-bought': '3/4', 'fresh baby spinach': '2-3', 'shredded or torn mozzarella or burrata cheese': '8', 'thinly sliced prosciutto': '3', 'fresh basil, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1.\t1. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F. Spray a 9 x 13-inch Pyrex Deep baking dish with cooking spray.', '2. Cover the bottom of your Pyrex dish with olive oil. In the pan, toss together the cherry tomatoes, olive oil, garlic, herbs, crushed red pepper flakes, and a large pinch of salt and pepper. Transfer to the oven and roast for 10-15 minutes or until the tomatoes collapse.', '3. Meanwhile, bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the pasta according to package directions until al dente. Drain and add the pasta back to the pot. Immediately toss with the pesto, spinach, and half of the cheese. Add the tomatoes and all the juices from the tomatoes and gently toss to combine. Season with freshly ground black pepper and salt. Transfer the pasta back into the Pyrex dish used to roast the tomatoes.', '4. Evenly sprinkle the remaining cheese over top the pasta, arrange the prosciutto, if using, over the cheese. Transfer to the oven and bake for 15 to 20 minutes, or until the cheese has melted and the prosciutto is crisp. Remove from the oven and garnish with fresh basil. Enjoy!']

title: Honey Butter Blackened Scallops with Herby Polenta.
ingredients: ['large scallops (about 16 scallops)', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'smoked paprika', 'ground cumin', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'salted butter', 'honey', 'juice of 1 lemon', 'whole milk', 'instant polenta', 'salted butter', 'Crème Fraîche or cream cheese', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'fresh herbs, chopped, such as basil, parsley, cilantro, and or dill']
ingredients with measurement: {'large scallops (about 16 scallops)': '1 1/2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'smoked paprika': '2', 'ground cumin': '2', 'garlic, minced or grated': '3', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'salted butter': '1', 'honey': '1', 'juice of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'whole milk': '2', 'instant polenta': '1', 'Crème Fraîche or cream cheese': '2', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'fresh herbs, chopped, such as basil, parsley, cilantro, and or dill': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Pat the scallops dry. In a medium bowl, combine the scallops paprika, cumin, garlic, crushed red pepper flakes, and a pinch each of salt and pepper.', '2. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the scallops and sear on both sides until browned, about 2-3 minutes. Add the butter, and honey. Top with the scallops and a sprinkle of fresh herbs. Squeeze lemon juice over top. Enjoy!']

title: Herb and Chickpea Stew with Rice.
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'chickpeas, drained', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'ground turmeric', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'lemon zest', 'low sodium vegetable broth', 'lemon juice', 'baby spinach', 'fresh cilantro, roughly chopped', 'fresh parsley, roughly chopped', 'fresh dill, roughly chopped', 'chopped chives', 'cooked basmati rice', 'plain Greek yogurt, for serving', 'fresh mint, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'chickpeas, drained': '2', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'garlic, minced or grated': '3', 'ground turmeric': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1/2', 'lemon zest': '2', 'low sodium vegetable broth': '3-4', 'lemon juice': '2', 'baby spinach': '2', 'fresh cilantro, roughly chopped': '1/2', 'fresh parsley, roughly chopped': '1/2', 'fresh dill, roughly chopped': '1/4', 'chopped chives': '1', 'cooked basmati rice': '2', 'plain Greek yogurt, for serving': 'seasoning', 'fresh mint, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the onion and cook 5 minutes until soft. Add the chickpeas and season with salt and pepper. Cook, stirring occasionally until he chickpeas begin to crisp, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic, turmeric, crushed red pepper, and lemon zest, cook until the garlic is fragrant, about 1 minute.', '2. Carefully remove 1 cup of chickpeas and reserve for topping, only if desired.', '3. To the chickpeas, add 3 cups broth, the lemon juice, and season with salt. Bring the mix to a boil over high heat, then reduce the heat to low. Stir in the spinach, cilantro, parsley, dill, and chives, and simmer 10-15 minutes, until the spinach is wilted and the stew is very fragrant. Taste, adjusting salt and pepper as needed. If you would like a thinner consistency, add the remaining 1 cup broth.', '4. To serve, divide the rice among bowls and ladle the stew overtop. Top with yogurt, the reserved chickpeas, and fresh mint.']

title: Instant Pot Irish Cheddar Bacon Mac and Cheese.
ingredients: ['thick cut bacon, diced', 'shredded brussels sprouts', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'pasta shells', 'salted butter', 'whole milk', 'shredded Irish cheddar or sharp cheddar cheese', 'garlic powder', 'cayenne pepper']
ingredients with measurement: {'thick cut bacon, diced': '4', 'shredded brussels sprouts': '4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'pasta shells': '1', 'salted butter': '3', 'whole milk': '3/4', 'shredded Irish cheddar or sharp cheddar cheese': '3-4', 'garlic powder': '1/2', 'cayenne pepper': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Set Instant pot to sauté. Add the bacon and cook until crisp, about 5 minutes. Transfer the bacon to a paper towel lined plate. If there is an excess amount of bacon grease, remove all but 1 tablespoon of grease.', '2. To the instant pot, add the brussels sprouts and season with salt and pepper. Cook 1 minute, then turn the instant pot off. Add the pasta, butter, and 3 1/2 cups water. Cover, select the manual setting, and cook on high pressure for 3 minutes.', 'dd the pasta, butter, and 3 1/2 cups water. Cover, select the manual setting, and cook on high pressure for 3 minutes.', '3.\xa0Once done cooking, use the quick release function and release the steam. Stir in the milk, cheddar, garlic powder, and cayenne, stirring until the cheese is fully melted, about 1-2 minutes. Taste, adding salt if needed. Serve immediately, topped with crispy bacon.']

title: Falafel Naan Wraps with Golden Rice and Special Sauce.
ingredients: ['salted butter', 'ground turmeric', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'long grain rice', 'chopped veggies, such as carrots, cauliflower, or broccoli', 'chickpeas, drained + rinsed', 'all-purpose flour. Use a gluten free flour, if needed', 'raw sesame seeds', 'garlic, grated', 'ground cumin', 'fresh cilantro, parsley, or oregano', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'canola or vegetable oil, for frying', 'fresh naan or pitas, warmed', 'shredded lettuce, cucumbers, and harissa sauce, for serving', 'plain Greek yogurt', 'honey', 'apple cider vinegar', 'lemon juice', 'fresh parsley chopped', 'garlic, grated']
ingredients with measurement: {'salted butter': '2', 'ground turmeric': '1/2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'long grain rice': '1', 'chopped veggies, such as carrots, cauliflower, or broccoli': '1', 'chickpeas, drained + rinsed': '1', 'all-purpose flour. Use a gluten free flour, if needed': '1/2', 'raw sesame seeds': '1/4', 'garlic, grated': '1', 'ground cumin': '1', 'fresh cilantro, parsley, or oregano': '1/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'canola or vegetable oil, for frying': 'seasoning', 'fresh naan or pitas, warmed': '6', 'shredded lettuce, cucumbers, and harissa sauce, for serving': 'seasoning', 'plain Greek yogurt': '1/2', 'honey': '2', 'apple cider vinegar': '1', 'lemon juice': '1', 'fresh parsley chopped': '1/4'}
instructions: ['1. To make the rice. Melt the butter, turmeric, and crushed red pepper flakes in a medium pot over high heat. Add the rice and toss to coat. Stir in 2 cups water and a pinch of salt and bring to a boil. Place the lid on the pot and turn the heat down to the lowest setting possible. Allow the rice to cook ten minutes on low and then turn the heat off completely. Let the rice sit, covered, for another 15 minutes (don’t take any peeks inside!). Fluff the rice with a fork.', '2. To make the falafel. Add the veggies to a food processor and pulse until finely chopped. Add the chickpeas, flour, sesame seeds, garlic, cumin, cilantro, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Pulse until the mixture is combined and mostly smooth. Roll the dough into rounded teaspoon size balls.', '3. Add a few inches of oil to the bottom of a heavy pot. Heat to 375 degrees F.\xa0Fry the balls for 2-3 minutes or until golden and cooked through. Drain onto paper towels and then sprinkle lightly with salt.', 'Fry the balls for 2-3 minutes or until golden and cooked through. Drain onto paper towels and then sprinkle lightly with salt.', '4. To make the special sauce. Combine all ingredients in a bowl, adding 1-2 tablespoons water if needed to thin the sauce. Taste and season with salt.', '5. To assemble, stuff the rice into the wraps and top with lettuce, falafels, and cucumber. Drizzle the special sauce and harissa over the falafels. Enjoy!']

title: Creamy Moroccan Tomato Soup.
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'garlic, smashed', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'smoked paprika', 'ground cumin', 'cans diced fire roasted tomatoes', 'harissa sauce', 'honey, or real maple syrup', 'full fat coconut milk', 'fresh cilantro or basil, chopped', 'goat cheese, crumbled', 'crispy chickpeas, for serving (optional)']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'garlic, smashed': '3', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'ground cumin': '1/2', 'cans diced fire roasted tomatoes': '2', 'harissa sauce': '2-3', 'honey, or real maple syrup': '2', 'full fat coconut milk': '1', 'fresh cilantro or basil, chopped': '1/4', 'goat cheese, crumbled': '4', 'crispy chickpeas, for serving (optional)': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Heat the olive oil in a large soup pot over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the onion and garlic, and season with salt and pepper. Cook 5 minutes or until the onion is fragrant and beginning to caramelize. Add the thyme, paprika, and cumin, cook another minute. Stir in the tomatoes, harissa, and honey. Cook 5 minutes until bubbling.', '2. Pour in the coconut milk. Transfer the soup to a blender and puree until mostly smooth. Return the soup to the pot and place over medium heat, Stir in the cilantro and half of the goat cheese, if using, and season the soup with salt and pepper. Thin with more coconut milk, if desired. Cook until warmed though, 5-10 minutes.', 'Transfer the soup to a blender and puree until mostly smooth. Return the soup to the pot and place over medium heat, Stir in the cilantro and half of the goat cheese, if using, and season the soup with salt and pepper. Thin with more coconut milk, if desired. Cook until warmed though, 5-10 minutes.', '4. To serve, ladle the soup among bowls and top with goat cheese, cilantro, and chickpeas. I recommend serving with a grilled cheese on the side!']

title: Quick Pantry Pasta with Sun-Dried Tomatoes and Burrata.

ingredients with measurement: {'short cut pasta': '1', 'Kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'oil pack sun-dried tomatoes, finely chopped, oil reserved': '1', 'garlic cloves, minced or grated': '4-6', 'dried oregano': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1/2', 'fresh basil, chopped': '1/2', 'zest of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'tomato paste': '2', 'grated Parmesan': '1/4', 'freshly ground black pepper': 'seasoning', 'fresh parsley, chopped': '1/4', 'burrata cheese cheese, torn': '8', 'fresh dill, roughly chopped, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1.\tBring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook the pasta according to package directions until al dente. Just before draining, reserve 1 cup of the pasta cooking water. title: Saucy Garlic Butter Shrimp with Coconut Milk and Rice Noodles

To serve, divide the noodles among bowls. Spoon the sauce and reserved shrimp and bacon over the noodles. Top with peppers and green onions. Enjoy!']

title: Brown Butter Lobster Ravioli with Tomato Cream Sauce
ingredients: ['lobster tails', 'uncooked shrimp, peeled and deveined', 'salted butter', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'crushed red pepper flakes, more or less to your taste', 'fresh parsley, chopped', 'lemon juice + lemon zest', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'whole milk ricotta cheese', 'fresh pasta dough or 40 wonton wrappers', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'salted butter', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'crushed san marzano tomatoes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'whole milk', 'freshly grated parmesan cheese, plus more for serving', 'fresh parsley, roughly chopped', 'fresh basil, roughly chopped']
ingredients with measurement: {'lobster tails': '3', 'uncooked shrimp, peeled and deveined': '1/4', 'salted butter': '2', 'garlic, minced or grated': '4', 'crushed red pepper flakes, more or less to your taste': '1/2', 'fresh parsley, chopped': '1/4', 'lemon juice + lemon zest': '1', 'kosher salt and pepper': '1/2', 'whole milk ricotta cheese': '1', 'fresh pasta dough or 40 wonton wrappers': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1/2', 'crushed san marzano tomatoes': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'whole milk': '1', 'freshly grated parmesan cheese, plus more for serving': '1/4', 'fresh parsley, roughly chopped': '1/4', 'fresh basil, roughly chopped': '1/4'}
instructions: ['1. To make the ravioli. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add the lobster tails and shrimp and cook until the shells turn bright red and the shrimp pink, about 5-8 minutes. Remove from the water using tongs. Let cool and then remove the lobster meat from the shell. Finely chop both the lobster meat and shrimp.', '2.\xa0In a large skillet, brown the butter over medium heat, stirring often until the butter is golden and toasted. Add the garlic and crushed red pepper and cook another minute. Remove from the heat and stir in the lobster, shrimp, parsley, lemon juice, lemon zest, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Add the ricotta cheese and mix to combine. Set the filling aside.', '3. Roll your pasta dough into lasagna sheets. Place 1 tablespoon of filling one inch apart over half the pasta sheet. Brush around the filling with water to moisten and then fold the sheet over the fillings, pressing down to seal. Cut into squares. Be sure to keep the ravioli covered as you work to prevent them from drying out. Repeat with remaining dough and filling. Alternately, you can make the ravioli in a ravioli press, or use this wonton wrapper method.', '4. To make the cream sauce. Heat the butter and oil over medium heat. Add onions and cook for 5 minutes, until fragrant. Add the garlic and cook another minute. Stir in the tomatoes and season with salt and pepper. Stir and cook over low heat for 15 to 20 minutes, stirring occasionally until thickened slightly. Stir in the milk, parmesan, parsley, and basil, and cook another 10 minutes, until warmed through.', '5.\xa0Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Boil the ravioli in batches about 1-2 minutes or until they float. Drain.', '6. Divide the ravioli among bowls and spoon the tomato sauce over top. EAT and ENJOY!']

title: Slow Cooker Chipotle Orange Street Tacos.

title: Sheet Pan Chicken Shawarma with Sesame Sweet Potatoes and Hummus

ingredients with measurement: {'boneless chicken breasts': '2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4', 'honey': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '4', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'ground cumin': '2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1/2', 'juice of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'medium sweet potatoes, sliced into 1/4 inch rounds': '2', 'toasted sesame seeds': '2', 'baby arugula': '4', 'sun-dried tomatoes + 2 tablespoons oil from the jar': '1/3', 'cubed feta cheese': '4', 'plain hummus, homemade or store-bought': '2', 'naan, Persian cucumbers, and fresh dill, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F.', '2. On a rimmed baking sheet, combine the chicken, 2 tablespoons olive oil, honey, garlic, paprika, cumin, crushed red pepper, the juice of 1 lemon, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Toss well to evenly coat the chicken. Add the sweet potatoes and drizzle with olive oil, sesame seeds, salt and pepper. Arrange everything in an even layer. Add the juiced lemon halves. title: Feel Good Ramen with Sweet Potatoes and Crispy Shallots

Cook 2-3 minutes. Add the chicken broth, spinach, sun-dried tomatoes, olives, and lemon juice. Bring to a boil over high heat and stir. Slide in the chicken and any juices left on the plate back into the skillet. Transfer to the oven and roast for 20 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through and the farro becomes soft.', '4. Serve the chicken topped with feta, dill, and pine nuts.']

title: Saucy 30 Minute Thai Basil Salmon Curry
ingredients: ['sesame oil', 'small shallots, chopped', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'lemongrass stalk, finely chopped', 'green onions, chopped', 'mixed wild mushrooms, torn', 'Thai red curry paste', 'can full fat coconut milk', 'fish sauce', 'honey', 'skinless salmon filets', 'roughly chopped bok choy or kale', 'juice and zest from 1 a lime', 'fresh cilantro or basil, roughly chopped', 'roasted cashews and steamed rice, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'sesame oil': '1/4', 'small shallots, chopped': '4', 'garlic, minced or grated': '4', 'fresh ginger, grated': '1', 'lemongrass stalk, finely chopped': '1', 'green onions, chopped': '2', 'mixed wild mushrooms, torn': '1', 'Thai red curry paste': '2-3', 'can full fat coconut milk': '2', 'fish sauce': '1', 'honey': '2', 'skinless salmon filets': '4', 'roughly chopped bok choy or kale': '2', 'juice and zest from 1 a lime': 'seasoning', 'fresh cilantro or basil, roughly chopped': '1/4', 'roasted cashews and steamed rice, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Heat the sesame oil in a large skillet over high heat. Add the shallots, garlic, ginger, lemongrass, and green onions. Cook 5-8 minutes, until they are fragrant and beginning to caramelize.', '2. Stir in the mushrooms and continue to cook another 5 minutes. Add the curry paste and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.', '3. Add the coconut milk, fish sauce, and honey. Stir to combine, bring the mixture to a boil, add the salmon and greens. Cover and cook 5-8 minutes or until the salmon is cooked to your desired doneness.', '4. Remove from the heat and stir in the lime zest, lime juice, cilantro and/or basil.', '5. To serve, divide the rice among bowls and spoon the curry overtop. Top with cashews and lime juice. Enjoy!']

title: 30 Minute Indian Coconut Butter Cauliflower
ingredients: ['cauliflower, cut into florets', 'canned full fat coconut milk', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'garam masala', 'yellow curry powder', 'turmeric', 'cayenne pepper ,more or less to taste', 'tomato paste', 'coconut oil', 'fresh cilantro, roughly chopped', 'steamed rice and naan, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'cauliflower, cut into florets': '1', 'canned full fat coconut milk': '2 1/3', 'garlic, minced or grated': '4', 'fresh ginger, grated': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1/2', 'garam masala': '1', 'yellow curry powder': '2', 'turmeric': '1/2', 'cayenne pepper ,more or less to taste': '1', 'tomato paste': '1', 'coconut oil': '2', 'fresh cilantro, roughly chopped': '1/4', 'steamed rice and naan, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1.\xa0Preheat the broiler to high. Grease a baking sheet with olive oil.', '2. In a large bowl, combine the cauliflower, 1/3 cup coconut milk, 2 cloves chopped garlic, 1 tablespoon grated ginger, and a pinch of salt. Let sit 10 minutes to "marinate". Spread the cauliflower in an even layer on the prepared baking sheet. Transfer to the oven and broil for 3-4 minutes, until the cauliflower is just beginning to char on the edges.', '3. Meanwhile, heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the onion and cook 5 minutes or until fragrant. Add the remaining garlic and ginger, cooking another 5 minutes.\xa0Stir in the garam masala, curry powder, turmeric, and cayenne, and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.', '4. Add the tomato paste and remaining 2 cups coconut milk. Stir to combine, bring the sauce to a boil, cook 5 minutes or until the sauce thickens slightly. Stir in coconut oil. If the sauce seems thick, thin with 1/2 to 1/2 additional coconut milk or water. Add the cauliflower and any juices on the pan and cook, stirring occasionally, until the sauce thickens slightly, about 5 minutes. Remove from the heat and stir in the cilantro. Season with salt and pepper.', '5. Serve the cauliflower and sauce over bowls of rice with fresh naan and mango chutney, if desired. Enjoy!']

title: Spinach and Artichoke Stuffed Soft Pretzels.
ingredients: ['warm water', 'light brown sugar', 'active dry yeast', 'wheat beer, at room temperature', 'salted butter', 'sea salt or kosher salt', 'all-purpose flour', 'baking soda', 'egg, beaten', 'Coarse sea salt', 'cream cheese', 'shredded mozzarella cheese', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed dry of excess water', 'jar marinated artichokes, chopped']
ingredients with measurement: {'warm water': '1/2', 'light brown sugar': '2', 'active dry yeast': '2 1/4', 'wheat beer, at room temperature': '1', 'salted butter': '1', 'sea salt or kosher salt': '1 1/2', 'all-purpose flour': '4 1/2', 'baking soda': '2/3', 'egg, beaten': '1', 'Coarse sea salt': 'seasoning', 'cream cheese': '4', 'shredded mozzarella cheese': '1/2', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/2', 'garlic, minced or grated': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1/2', 'frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed dry of excess water': '1/2', 'jar marinated artichokes, chopped': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Combine the water, brown sugar and yeast in the bowl of a stand mixer and mix with the dough hook until combined. Let sit for 5 minutes.', '2. Add the beer, melted butter, salt, and flour to the mixture and mix on low-speed until combined. Increase the speed to medium and continue kneading until the dough is smooth and begins to pull away from the sides of the bowl, about 3 to 4 minutes. If the dough appears too wet, add additional flour, 1 tablespoon at a time. Remove the dough from the bowl, place on a flat surface and knead into a ball with your hands. Coat a large bowl with oil, add the dough and turn to coat with the oil. Cover with a clean towel or plastic wrap and place in a warm spot until the dough doubles in size. This will take about 1 hour.', '3. Meanwhile, make the dip.\xa0In a medium bowl, combine the cream cheese, mozzarella, parmesan, garlic, and a pinch of crushed red pepper and salt. Stir in the spinach and artichokes.', '4. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Bring a large pot of water to a boil.', '5.\xa0Divide the pretzel dough into 8 equal balls and roll each out into a rectangle (about 11x3 inches). Spread about 1 1/2 tablespoons spinach and artichoke dip along the length of each piece. Starting with the opposite side, roll the dough up into a log, enclosing the toppings inside. Pinch the seams together and then very gently roll the dough with your hands to form an even cylinder and fully enclose the filling (see above photos).', '6.\xa0To shape into pretzels, take the right side and cross over to the left. Cross right to left again and flip up. Slowly add the baking soda to the boiling water. Boil the pretzels in the water, 2 at a time for 30 seconds, splashing the tops with the warmed water using a spoon. Remove with a large flat slotted spatula or a spider. Line two baking sheets with parchment paper placing 4 pretzels on each. Brush the tops with the beaten egg wash and season liberally with sea salt. Bake for 15 to 18 minutes or until pretzels are golden brown.', '7.\xa0Remove pretzels from oven and let cool 5 minutes. Serve and enjoy! If needed, the pretzels can be reheated in a 350 degrees F. for 15 minutes.']

title: Pesto Bolognese Lasagna
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'medium yellow onion, chopped', 'red bell pepper, chopped', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'ground spicy Italian sausage', 'lean ground beef', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'chopped tomatoes', 'tomato paste', 'dried oregano', 'bay leaf', 'whole milk', 'shredded provolone cheese', 'whole milk ricotta cheese', 'basil pesto, homemade or store bought', 'fresh mozzarella, torn', 'no-boil lasagna noodles', 'grated parmesan and fresh basil, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'medium yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'red bell pepper, chopped': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'ground spicy Italian sausage': '3/4', 'lean ground beef': '1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'chopped tomatoes': '1', 'tomato paste': '1/4', 'dried oregano': '2', 'bay leaf': '1', 'whole milk': '1', 'shredded provolone cheese': '2', 'whole milk ricotta cheese': '2', 'basil pesto, homemade or store bought': '1/2', 'fresh mozzarella, torn': '6', 'no-boil lasagna noodles': '1', 'grated parmesan and fresh basil, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Heat the olive oil in a large soup pot over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the onion and season with salt and pepper. Cook 5 minutes or until the onion is fragrant and beginning to caramelize. Add the bell pepper, garlic, sausage, and beef, brown all over, breaking up the meat as you go, about 10 minutes.', '2. Add the tomatoes, tomato paste, oregano, bay leaves, milk, and 1 cup of water. Season with salt and pepper. Stir to combine. Cook over medium for 30 minutes, until the sauce has thickened slightly. Or cook, covered, for up to 3 hours over low heat, stirring occasionally. The longer you can cook, the more flavorful.\xa0Remove the bay leaves and discard.\xa0If your sauce seems thick, add 1/2 cup additional water to thin.', '4.\xa0In a medium bowl combine the ricotta and pesto.', '5. Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F. Grease a 9x13 inch pan. Spread 1/4 of the Bolognese sauce onto the bottom of the dish. Top with 3-4 lasagna sheets. Spread with 1/2 the ricotta cheese mixture, another 1/4 of the Bolognese sauce, and half of the provolone. Place another 3-4 lasagna noodles on top. Then top with the remaining ricotta cheese mixture, another 1/4 of the Bolognese sauce, and the remaining provolone. Add the remaining lasagna noodles and pour the remaining Bolognese sauce over top. Top with mozzarella and parmesan cheese. Bake uncovered for 45 minutes or until the top has bubbled up and browned a bit. Let stand 10 minutes before serving.']

title: Rosemary Beef Tenderloin with Wild Mushroom Cream Sauce
ingredients: ['beef tenderloin, cut into 6 steaks', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'fresh chopped rosemary', 'garlic, finely chopped', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salted butter', 'shallots thinly, sliced', 'wild mushrooms, torn', 'dijon mustard', 'dry white wine', 'heavy cream or whole milk', 'grated parmesan', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'crushed red pepper flakes']
ingredients with measurement: {'beef tenderloin, cut into 6 steaks': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'fresh chopped rosemary': '2', 'garlic, finely chopped': '3', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '2', 'shallots thinly, sliced': '2', 'wild mushrooms, torn': '12', 'dijon mustard': '2', 'dry white wine': '1/2', 'heavy cream or whole milk': '1', 'grated parmesan': '1/3', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F.', '2. Rub the steaks with rosemary, and garlic. Season each side with salt and pepper.', '3. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the steaks and sear each side, about 2 minutes per side. Transfer the steaks to a baking sheet sheet and then place in the oven. Roast until the meat registers 120 to 125 degrees F. on a meat thermometer. For medium-rare/rare, about 8-12 minutes.\xa0Remove from the oven, cover tightly with foil, and allow to rest for 10 minutes.', '4. Meanwhile, make the sauce. Melt the butter in a skillet set over medium high heat.\xa0Add the shallots and mushrooms and season with salt and pepper. Cook undisturbed for 5 minutes or until golden, stir and continue cooking until the mushrooms have caramelized, 3-5 minutes. Remove the mushrooms from the skillet to a plate.', '4. Add the wine and scrape up any browned bits off the pan. Simmer 3-5 minutes or until the wine has reduced by about 1/3. Slowly pour in the cream and mustard. Bring the sauce to a boil. Reduce the heat to low and simmer 5 minutes or until the sauce has thickened slightly. Remove from the heat and stir in the parmesan. Season the sauce with salt and pepper and crushed red pepper. Stir in the mushrooms.', '5. Serve the steaks with flaky salt and pour the sauce overtop. Enjoy!']

title: White Pesto Spinach Lasagna
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'salted butter', 'wild mushrooms, roughly torn', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'dried oregano', 'all-purpose flour', 'whole milk', 'vegetable broth', 'shredded Emmi Raclette (provolone or fontina can be used)', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'whole milk ricotta cheese', 'frozen spinach, thawed and drained', 'basil pesto, homemade or store bought', 'no-boil lasagna noodles']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'salted butter': '6', 'wild mushrooms, roughly torn': '12', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'dried oregano': '1', 'all-purpose flour': '1/4', 'whole milk': '2', 'vegetable broth': '2', 'shredded Emmi Raclette (provolone or fontina can be used)': '2', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1', 'whole milk ricotta cheese': '2', 'frozen spinach, thawed and drained': '2', 'basil pesto, homemade or store bought': '1/2', 'no-boil lasagna noodles': '1'}

Let stand 10 minutes before serving.']

title: Skillet Roasted French Onion Chicken and Potatoes
ingredients: ['skin on, bone in, chicken breasts', 'shredded Gruyère cheese', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'salted butter', 'large yellow onions, thinly sliced', 'chopped fresh sage', 'crushed red pepper flakes, more or less to taste', 'mixed baby potatoes, halved if large', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'worchestire sauce']
ingredients with measurement: {'skin on, bone in, chicken breasts': '2', 'shredded Gruyère cheese': '1', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'salted butter': '2', 'large yellow onions, thinly sliced': '2', 'chopped fresh sage': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes, more or less to taste': '1/2', 'mixed baby potatoes, halved if large': '1', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '1', 'worchestire sauce': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F.', '2. Loosen the skin of the chicken breast with your finger tips. Stuff about 1/4 cup of cheese underneath the skin of each breast. Season the chicken with 1 tablespoon fresh thyme, salt, and pepper.', '3.\xa0Melt together the olive oil and butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the onions and season with salt and pepper. Cook 10-15 minutes, stirring frequently, until softened, deep golden in color and caramelized. Add the remaining 1 tablespoon thyme and the sage, red pepper flakes, and continue cooking another 3-5 minutes.', '4. Add the potatoes, tossing to coat. Reduce the heat to medium. Pour in the wine and worchestire sauce. Arrange the chicken over the potatoes, skin side facing up. Season with salt and pepper. Transfer to the oven and roast for 30-40 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through, and the potatoes fork tender.', '5. Serve the chicken with the onions and sauce spooned over top, and the potatoes on the side.']

title: Ginger Peanut Chicken Noodle Soup
ingredients: ['sesame oil', 'bone in, skin on, chicken breast', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'shallot, chopped', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'fish sauce', 'honey', 'baby bok choy or baby spinach, roughly chopped', 'egg noodles', 'roasted peanuts, roughly chopped', 'jalapeños, green onions, and lime, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'sesame oil': '2', 'bone in, skin on, chicken breast': '1', 'fresh ginger, grated': '1', 'shallot, chopped': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'low sodium chicken broth': '6', 'low sodium soy sauce': '1/4', 'fish sauce': '1', 'honey': '2', 'baby bok choy or baby spinach, roughly chopped': '4', 'egg noodles': '1', 'roasted peanuts, roughly chopped': '1/2', 'jalapeños, green onions, and lime, for serving': 'seasoning'}

Reduce the heat to low, add the ginger, shallot, and garlic. Cook another 1 minute, until fragrant. Add the broth, soy sauce, fish sauce, and honey. title: Ginger Sesame Chicken Potstickers with Sweet Chili Pomegranate Sauce
ingredients: ['raw ground chicken, turkey, or pork', 'shredded kale', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'garlic, grated', 'green onions, chopped', 'carrots, shredded', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'sesame oil, plus more for cooking', 'black pepper', 'round wonton wrappers', 'raw sesame seeds', 'sweet Thai chili sauce', 'pomegranate juice', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'pomegranate arils']
ingredients with measurement: {'raw ground chicken, turkey, or pork': '1', 'shredded kale': '1', 'fresh ginger, grated': '1', 'garlic, grated': '2', 'green onions, chopped': '2', 'carrots, shredded': '2', 'low sodium soy sauce': '2', 'sesame oil, plus more for cooking': '2', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'round wonton wrappers': '40', 'raw sesame seeds': '1/3', 'sweet Thai chili sauce': '1/2', 'pomegranate juice': '1/4', 'pomegranate arils': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1.\xa0In a medium bowl, combine the raw ground chicken, kale, carrots, ginger, garlic, green onions, soy sauce, sesame oil, and a pinch of black pepper, to taste.', '2. Working with 1 wonton wrapper at a time, spoon 1 tablespoon of filling into the center of each wrapper. Brush water around the edge of the wrapper. Fold the dough over the filling to create a half moon shape, pinching the edges to seal. Repeat with the remaining wrappers.', '3. Place the sesame seeds in a shallow bowl. Brush the bottoms of the potstickers with water and then dredge them in the sesame seeds.', '4. Heat a few tablespoons of oil in a large skillet set over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the potstickers and cook until the bottoms are light golden brown, about 2-3 minutes. Carefully pour 1/4 cup of water into the skillet, it will splatter, so stand back. Immediately cover with a tight-fitting lid. Turn heat to medium-low and let the dumplings steam for 5-6 minutes, until the filling is cooked through inside. Serve right away with sauce (see below).', '5. To make the sauce, combine all ingredients in a medium bowl. Serve alongside the potstickers.']

title: Turkey and Wild Rice Pot Pie
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'salted butter', 'small shallots, chopped', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'all-purpose flour', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'dry white wine, such as Sauvignon Blanc or Pinot Grigio', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'parmesan rind', 'carrots, chopped', 'roughly chopped kale or spinach', 'cooked wild rice', 'cooked shredded turkey or chicken', 'zest of 1 lemon', 'pie crust rounds', 'egg, beaten']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'salted butter': '3', 'small shallots, chopped': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'all-purpose flour': '1/3', 'low sodium chicken broth': '4', 'dry white wine, such as Sauvignon Blanc or Pinot Grigio': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'parmesan rind': '1', 'carrots, chopped': '6', 'roughly chopped kale or spinach': '1', 'cooked wild rice': '1', 'cooked shredded turkey or chicken': '1-2', 'zest of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'pie crust rounds': '2', 'egg, beaten': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat oven to 375 degrees F.', '2. Melt the butter with the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the shallot, and thyme and cook, stirring often, until shallot is fragrant and golden, about 4 minutes. Add the flour and cook 1-2 minutes, until golden.', '3. Gradually whisk in the broth and wine, and season with salt and pepper. Add the parmesan rind. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat and simmer, whisking occasionally, until mixture thickens slightly, about 10 minutes. Stir in the carrots and kale, and cook until just tender, about 5 minutes.', '4. Remove from the heat and add the turkey, wild rice, and lemon zest, season with salt, and pepper. Remove the parmesan rind and discard.', '5. Transfer mixture to a shallow 2-qt. baking dish or to 6 (8 ounce) ramekins. Alternately, if using a cast iron skillet, you can bake the pie in the skillet.', '6. Gently roll out the pie crust on a lightly floured surface to just the size of your baking dish. If using ramekins, cut crust into smaller circles to fit. Place over the baking dish. Brush with beaten egg, and cut 2 or 3 slits into the pastry with a sharp knife.', '7. Place the pies on a baking sheet. Transfer to the oven and bake until the crust is golden brown, 30-40 minutes. Serve with fresh thyme.']

title: Red Wine Cranberry Braised Short Ribs

title: Slow Cooker Vodka Bolognese Pasta

title: Golden Sweet Potato Soup with Burrata and Sage Pesto
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'fresh sage leaves, chopped', 'Tuscan kale, chopped', 'shelled roasted pistachios', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'kosher salt and crushed red pepper flakes', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'shallots, thinly sliced', 'fresh thyme, chopped', 'salted butter', 'low-sodium chicken or veggie broth', 'peeled, cubed sweet potatoes', 'nutmeg', 'cayenne, to your taste', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'full fat coconut milk', 'burrata cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'fresh sage leaves, chopped': '1/2', 'Tuscan kale, chopped': '1', 'shelled roasted pistachios': '1/4', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/4', 'kosher salt and crushed red pepper flakes': 'seasoning', 'shallots, thinly sliced': '2', 'fresh thyme, chopped': '2', 'salted butter': '3', 'low-sodium chicken or veggie broth': '4', 'peeled, cubed sweet potatoes': '3', 'nutmeg': '1/4', 'cayenne, to your taste': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'full fat coconut milk': '1', 'burrata cheese': '8'}
instructions: ['1. To make the pesto. Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the sage and cook 2 minutes, until fragrant and crisp. Remove from heat.', '2. In a food processor, pulse together the remaining 1/3 cup olive oil, kale, pistachios, and parmesan until finely chopped. Add the sage and season to taste with salt and crushed red pepper flakes, pulse to combine.', '3. Make the soup. Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the shallots and cook until soft, about 5 minutes. Add the thyme and butter, cook another 30 seconds. Pour in the broth. Add the sweet potatoes, cayenne, nutmeg, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Bring the soup to a boil over medium-high heat and then reduce the heat to medium-low. Cover and simmer for 15 to 20 minutes, until the potatoes are fork-tender.', '4. Using an immersion blender, blend the soup directly in the pot until smooth. Stir in the coconut milk and 2 tablespoons sage pesto, cook another 5 minutes. If the soup is thick, thin with addition broth.', '5. To serve, ladle the soup into bowls. Swirl each bowl of soup with pesto. Break the burrata and spoon some over top the soup. Enjoy!']

title: Healthier Instant Pot Coq au Vin

title: Herby French Shallot Soup
ingredients: ['salted butter', 'medium shallots, thinly sliced', 'yellow onion, thinly sliced', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'chopped fresh sage', 'honey or brown sugar', 'all-purpose flour', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'low sodium chicken or vegetable broth', 'Worcestershire sauce', 'bay leaves', 'black pepper', 'french bread', 'shredded Gruyère cheese', 'crumbled blue cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'salted butter': '6', 'medium shallots, thinly sliced': '6', 'yellow onion, thinly sliced': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'chopped fresh sage': '1', 'honey or brown sugar': '1', 'all-purpose flour': '2', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '1', 'low sodium chicken or vegetable broth': '2', 'Worcestershire sauce': '1', 'bay leaves': '2', 'black pepper': '1', 'french bread': '6', 'shredded Gruyère cheese': '1', 'crumbled blue cheese': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Melt the butter in a large soup pot over medium-high heat. Add the shallots, onions, garlic and honey. Cook about 10-15 minutes, stirring frequently, until softened, deep golden in color and caramelized. Add the thyme and sage and continue cooking another 3-5 minutes.', '2. Reduce the heat to low and sprinkle the flour over the shallots, stirring for 1-2 minutes, until the raw flour taste is eliminated. Add the wine, broth, Worcestershire sauce, and bay leaves. Increase the heat to medium-high and return the soup to a simmer, simmer for 10 minutes. Remove the bay leaves and discard. Season, to taste with salt and pepper.', '4. Preheat the broiler to high.', '5. Ladle the soup into oven safe bowls. Add a slice of bread to each and top evenly with each cheese. Place each soup bowl on a baking sheet and transfer to the oven, broil until bubbly and golden brown, 3 to 5 minutes. Eat!']

title: Slow Cooker Herbed Chicken and Rice Pilaf
ingredients: ['wild rice blend (mix wild and brown rice)', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'juice of 1 lemon', 'dried parsley', 'carrot, cut into 1 inch pieces', 'wild mushrooms, torn', 'bone-in chicken breast and or thighs', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'fresh chopped sage', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'shallots, halved', 'sprig fresh rosemary']

title: Sweet Potato Gnocchi with Herbed White Wine Pan Sauce
ingredients: ['medium sweet potatoes', 'whole milk ricotta', 'large egg', 'all-purpose flour', 'kosher salt', 'salted butter', 'shallot, chopped', 'fresh thyme leaves, homegrown Burpee Tasty Thyme', 'chopped fresh rosemary, homegrown Burpee Rockin’ Rosemary', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'cayenne pepper', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'shaved manchego or parmesan cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'medium sweet potatoes': '2', 'whole milk ricotta': '1/2', 'large egg': '1', 'all-purpose flour': '2-3', 'kosher salt': '1', 'salted butter': '6', 'shallot, chopped': '1', 'fresh thyme leaves, homegrown Burpee Tasty Thyme': '2', 'chopped fresh rosemary, homegrown Burpee Rockin’ Rosemary': '2', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '1/2', 'cayenne pepper': '1', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'shaved manchego or parmesan cheese': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat your oven to 400 degrees F.', '2. Poke a few holes in the sweet potatoes and bake for 45 minutes or until soft and tender. When the sweet potatoes are cooked, slice them in half, allow to cool, and finely mash or puree them.', '3. In a large bowl, mix together the sweet potatoes, ricotta, egg, salt, and flour. Stir the mixture until just combined. If the dough seems wet, add a tablespoon of flour at a time, until it can be formed into a ball. The dough should be sticky.', '4. Generously flour a clean counter and scrape the dough out onto it. Cut the dough into four equal pieces. Working with one piece of dough at a time, roll the dough into a rope about 1 inch thick and cut into bite size pieces. Repeat this process with the other pieces of dough and place the gnocchi on a baking sheet that has been dusted with flour. At this point, the gnocchi can be kept covered in the fridge for up to 1 day, and then boiled just before you are ready to eat. Or boiled right away.', '5. To make the sauce. Heat the butter and shallot in a large skillet over medium-high heat and cook until the shallot is fragrant and the butter begins to brown, about 3-5 minutes. Stir in the thyme and rosemary and cook 1 minute. Add the wine and cayenne, and season with salt and pepper. Simmer the sauce for 3-5 minutes. Keep warm over low heat.', '6. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Boil the gnocchi until they float to the top and are cooked through, about 3-4 minutes. Remove the gnocchi using a slotted spoon or spider strainer and drop right into the sauce, gently tossing to combine. If the sauce thickens up, add a splash of the gnocchi cooking water to thin it a bit.', '7. Divide the gnocchi among bowls. Top with manchego. EAT!']

title: Healthy Slow Cooker Turkey and White Bean Chili
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'yellow onions, chopped', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'ground turkey or chicken', 'red peppers, seeded and chopped', 'chipotle peppers in adobo, finely chopped', 'chili powder', 'smoked paprika', 'ground cumin', 'ground cinnamon', 'salt', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'crushed tomatoes', 'tomato paste', 'apple butter', 'bay leaves', 'white beans, drained', 'cheddar cheese, avocado, green onions, and cilantro for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1', 'yellow onions, chopped': '2', 'garlic, minced or grated': '4', 'ground turkey or chicken': '2', 'red peppers, seeded and chopped': '2', 'chipotle peppers in adobo, finely chopped': '2', 'chili powder': '2', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'ground cumin': '2', 'ground cinnamon': '1', 'salt': '1 1/2', 'low sodium chicken broth': '2-3', 'crushed tomatoes': '1', 'tomato paste': '1/4', 'apple butter': '1', 'bay leaves': '2', 'white beans, drained': '1', 'cheddar cheese, avocado, green onions, and cilantro for serving': 'seasoning'}

title: Herby Buttered Balsamic Mushroom Ravioli

instructions: ['1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the ravioli according to package directions until al dente. Reserve 1/2 cup of the pasta cooking water. Drain the ravioli.', '2. Meanwhile, heat\xa0the olive oil in a large skillet over high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the shallots and cook until fragrant, 2-3 minutes. Add the mushrooms and season with salt and pepper. Cook, stirring occasionally until the garlic is caramelized and fragrant, about 5 minutes.', 'the olive oil in a large skillet over high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the shallots and cook until fragrant, 2-3 minutes. Add the mushrooms and season with salt and pepper. title: 30 Minute Butter Chicken Meatballs
ingredients: ['ground turkey or chicken', 'egg', 'panko bread crumbs', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'garam masala', 'curry powder', 'turmeric', 'cayenne pepper, more or less to taste', 'tomato paste', 'full fat coconut milk', 'plain greek yogurt', 'butter', 'fresh cilantro, roughly chopped', 'steamed rice and naan, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'ground turkey or chicken': '1', 'egg': '1', 'panko bread crumbs': '1/2', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1/2', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'fresh ginger, grated': '1', 'garam masala': '1', 'curry powder': '2', 'turmeric': '1/2', 'cayenne pepper, more or less to taste': '1', 'tomato paste': '1', 'full fat coconut milk': '1', 'plain greek yogurt': '1/2', 'butter': '2', 'fresh cilantro, roughly chopped': '1/4', 'steamed rice and naan, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment.', '2. Add the turkey, egg, bread crumbs, and a pinch each of salt and pepper to a bowl. Coat your hands with a bit of olive oil, and roll the meat into tablespoon size balls (will make 15-20 meatballs), placing them on the prepared baking sheet. Transfer to the oven and bake for 15 minutes or until the meatballs are crisp and cooked through.', '3. Meanwhile, heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.\xa0Add the onion and cook 5 minutes or until fragrant. Add the garlic and ginger, cooking another 5 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.', '3. Stir in the garam masala, curry powder, turmeric, and cayenne and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.', '4. Add the tomato paste, coconut milk, and 1/2 cup water. Stir to combine, bring the sauce to a boil, cook 5 minutes or until the sauce thickens slightly. Stir in the yogurt and butter. Add the meatballs and cook, stirring occasionally, until the sauce thickens slightly, about 5 minutes. Remove from the heat and stir in the cilantro.', '5. Serve the meatballs and sauce over bowls of rice with fresh naan. Enjoy!']

title: Rosemary Chicken, Caramelized Corn, and Peach Salad with Hot Bacon Vinaigrette
ingredients: ['boneless skinless chicken tenders', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'fresh chopped rosemary', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'small shallot, chopped', 'ears corn kernels, removed from cob', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'mixed salad greens', 'fresh basil, roughly torn', 'peaches, sliced', 'crumbled goat cheese, feta, or blue cheese', 'avocado, sliced', 'thick cut bacon, chopped', 'champagne vinegar', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'honey', 'kosher salt and pepper']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless skinless chicken tenders': '1 1/2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'fresh chopped rosemary': '1', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'small shallot, chopped': '1', 'ears corn kernels, removed from cob': '4', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'mixed salad greens': '6', 'fresh basil, roughly torn': '1', 'peaches, sliced': '1-2', 'crumbled goat cheese, feta, or blue cheese': '1/3', 'avocado, sliced': '1', 'thick cut bacon, chopped': '4', 'champagne vinegar': '2', 'honey': '1'}
instructions: ['1.\tIn a medium bowl, toss together the chicken, 1 tablespoon each of olive oil and rosemary, and a pinch each of salt and pepper.', '2. Heat a large skillet over medium high heat. Add the chicken and sear 3-5 minutes per side until the chicken is golden and cooked through. Remove from the skillet.', '3. To the same skillet, add the remaining tablespoon of olive oil. When the oil shimmers, add the shallot and cook 1 minute until fragrant. Add the corn, a pinch of crushed red pepper flakes, and season with salt and pepper. title: Salsa Verde Chicken and Zucchini Enchiladas with Mango
ingredients: ['boneless skinless chicken tenders or small breasts', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'chili powder', 'cumin', 'smoked paprika', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'zucchini or yellow summer squash, chopped', 'poblano pepper, sliced', 'mango, chopped', 'salsa verde, homemade or store-bought', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'corn or flour tortillas, warmed', 'shredded cheddar', 'shredded pepper jack', 'avocado, sliced', 'juice of 1 lime']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless skinless chicken tenders or small breasts': '1 1/2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'chili powder': '2', 'cumin': '2', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'zucchini or yellow summer squash, chopped': '2', 'poblano pepper, sliced': '1', 'mango, chopped': '1', 'salsa verde, homemade or store-bought': '2', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/2', 'corn or flour tortillas, warmed': '10-12', 'shredded cheddar': '1', 'shredded pepper jack': '1/2', 'avocado, sliced': '1', 'juice of 1 lime': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F.', '2. Toss the chicken with 1 tablespoon olive oil, chili powder, cumin, and paprika. Season with salt and pepper.', '3. Heat a large skillet over medium high heat. Add the chicken and cook 4-5 minutes per side or until cooked through. Remove the chicken from the skillet and shred with 2 forks.', '4. Add the remaining olive oil to the skillet. When the oil shimmers, add the zucchini and poblano pepper. Cook until the zucchini has caramelized and is soft, about 10 minutes. Remove from the heat and add the shredded chicken, 1/2 cup salsa verde, 1/2 cup mango chunks, and cilantro. Toss to combine.', '5. To assemble. Pour 1/2 cup of the salsa verde onto the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish.\xa0Spoon a little of the chicken mixture down the center of each warmed tortilla, tuck and roll, placing the tortilla, seam side down, into the baking dish. Pour the remaining salsa verde over top of the enchiladas and then top with the remaining the cheese. Transfer to the oven and bake for 15-20 minutes, until the cheese has melted.', 'Spoon a little of the chicken mixture down the center of each warmed tortilla, tuck and roll, placing the tortilla, seam side down, into the baking dish. Pour the remaining salsa verde over top of the enchiladas and then top with the remaining the cheese. Transfer to the oven and bake for 15-20 minutes, until the cheese has melted.', '6. To serve, top with avocado, the remaining mango, lime juice, and fresh cilantro. EAT.', '6. To serve, top with avocado, the remaining mango, lime juice, and fresh cilantro. EAT.']

title: Heirloom Tomato, Basil, and Manchego Garlic Bread

title: Chipotle Shrimp Cobb Salad with Jalapeño Corn Vinaigrette

title: One Pan Zucchini and 3 Cheese Lasagna
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'ground spicy Italian sausage', 'small sweet onion, diced', 'medium heirloom tomatoes (or regular), roughly chopped', 'cherry tomatoes', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'fresh chopped oregano', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'red wine', 'fresh basil, roughly chopped, plus more for serving', 'no boil lasagna noodles', 'medium zucchini, sliced into 1/8 inch slices', 'whole milk ricotta cheese', 'fresh mozzarella cheese, torn', 'grated parmesan cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'ground spicy Italian sausage': '1', 'small sweet onion, diced': '1', 'medium heirloom tomatoes (or regular), roughly chopped': '4', 'cherry tomatoes': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'fresh chopped oregano': '1', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'red wine': '1/2', 'fresh basil, roughly chopped, plus more for serving': '1/4', 'no boil lasagna noodles': '6-8', 'medium zucchini, sliced into 1/8 inch slices': '3', 'whole milk ricotta cheese': '1', 'fresh mozzarella cheese, torn': '1', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F.', '2. Heat a large, oven safe skillet over medium high heat. Add the sausage and onion and cook until the sausage is browned all over, about 8 minutes. Stir in the tomatoes and any juices left on the cutting board. Add the cherry tomatoes, thyme, and oregano, season generously with salt and pepper. Pour in the wine and 1 1/2 cups water. Cover and simmer 10 minutes or until the tomatoes are soft and have released their juices. Remove from the heat and stir in the basil.', '3. Break the lasagna noodles in half and press half of them into the tomato sauce. Dollop on the ricotta cheese, then add half the zucchini in an even layer, pressing it into the sauce and submerging it. Add the remaining noodles, submerging them into the sauce. Add half the mozzarella and then arrange the remaining zucchini on top in an even layer. Season with salt and pepper. Top with mozzarella and parmesan.', '4. Transfer to the oven and bake for 25-30 minutes or until the cheese is golden and the sauce has thickened slightly. Serve warm topped with fresh basil.']

title: Skillet Balsamic Peach Pork Chops with Feta and Basil
ingredients: ['bone-in pork chops', 'Kosher salt and black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'balsamic vinegar', 'honey', 'chopped fresh oregano or thyme leaves', 'peaches, sliced', 'feta cheese, cubed or crumbled', 'fresh basil', 'crushed red pepper flakes']
ingredients with measurement: {'bone-in pork chops': '2', 'Kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'balsamic vinegar': '½', 'honey': '1', 'chopped fresh oregano or thyme leaves': '1', 'peaches, sliced': '2', 'feta cheese, cubed or crumbled': '6', 'fresh basil': '1/2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the broiler to high.', '2. Heat a large skillet over medium high heat. Season the pork chops all over with kosher salt and pepper. Add the olive oil to the skillet, when the oil shimmers, add the pork and sear on both sides for 3-4 minutes. Reduce the heat to medium and continue cooking for about 8-10 minutes, or until the pork chops are cooked through.', '3. In a small bowl, whisk together the balsamic vinegar, honey, and oregano. During the last 2 minutes of cooking, pour the balsamic sauce over the pork chops. Remove from the heat and add the peaches. Transfer the skillet to the oven and broil for 4-5 minutes or until the peaches are lightly charred. If the balsamic sauce starts getting too thick, add ¼ cup of water to keep it saucy.', '4. Remove from the oven and top with feta, fresh basil, and chili flakes. Serve the pork with the peaches and balsamic sauce from the pan. Enjoy!']

title: Garlic Butter Creamed Corn Chicken
ingredients: ['boneless, skinless chicken breasts or thighs', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'fresh chopped thyme, plus more for serving', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'all-purpose flour', 'thick cut bacon, chopped', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'butter', 'corn, kernels removed from cob', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'heavy cream, canned full fat coconut milk, or whole milk', 'grated parmesan or Asiago cheese', 'fresh basil']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless, skinless chicken breasts or thighs': '1 1/2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'fresh chopped thyme, plus more for serving': '1', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'all-purpose flour': '1/4', 'thick cut bacon, chopped': '4', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'butter': '2', 'corn, kernels removed from cob': '4', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '3/4', 'heavy cream, canned full fat coconut milk, or whole milk': '1/2', 'grated parmesan or Asiago cheese': '1/2', 'fresh basil': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Rub the chicken all over with 1 tablespoon olive oil, thyme, and season generously with salt and pepper. Sprinkle the flour evenly over the chicken and toss to coat, adding more flour if needed to cover the chicken.', '2. Heat a large skillet over medium high heat and cook the bacon until crisp. Remove the bacon from the pan and drain onto paper towels.', '3. Add the chicken to the pan and sear on both sides until golden, about 5 minutes per side. Remove the chicken from the pan.', '4. Add the remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil. When the oil shimmers, add the onion and cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add the butter, corn, garlic, and red pepper flakes. Cook another 5 minutes or until the corn is golden.', '5. Reduce the heat to medium low and pour in the wine and 1/2 cup water. Add the chicken back to the skillet and bring to a simmer over medium heat. Simmer the chicken for 10-15 minutes until cooked through. Stir in the heavy cream and parmesan, cook another few minutes until warmed through. Remove from the heat and top with bacon.', '5. Serve the chicken topped with fresh thyme and basil. Enjoy!']

title: Cheesy Zucchini and Corn Pie

title: Spanish Tortilla with Burrata and Herbs
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'Yukon gold potatoes, cut into 1/4 inch slices', 'onion thinly, sliced or chopped', 'kosher salt', 'eggs', 'black pepper', 'chopped fresh basil, plus more for serving', 'fresh chopped dill, plus more for serving', 'chopped fresh chives, plus more for serving', 'thinly sliced prosciutto', 'ball burrata cheese, broken', 'fresh arugula, for serving']

instructions: ['1. Preheat the broiler.', '2. In a large, oven safe skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the potatoes, onion, and salt. Bring the oil to a gentle bubble, then reduce the heat to medium-low and cook, stirring often, until the potatoes are fork tender, about 20-25 minutes.', '3. Using a slotted spoon, transfer the potatoes and onion to a bowl. Add the the eggs, basil, dill, chives, and a large pinch of pepper, gently stir to combine, being carful not to break the potatoes.', '4. Strain the oil out the skillet and wipe the skillet clean. Heat 2 tablespoon of the reserve oil over medium high heat. Add the potato and egg mix and cook, stirring gently until the eggs just begin to set, about 2-3 minutes. Spread the mix into an even layer and reduce the heat to medium-low. Cook, shaken the pan occasionally to prevent sticking until the eggs are set and just cooked through, about 15-20 minutes. Transfer to the oven and broil 2-3 minutes.', '5. Remove from the oven, run a spatula around the edge of the skillet to help release the tortilla, then carefully invert onto a serving plate. title: Asada Mushroom Tacos with Lime Smashed Avocado

title: Zucchini, Bacon, and Pecorino Tart
ingredients: ['frozen puff pastry, thawed', 'medium zucchini, chopped', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'kosher salt', 'cubed bacon or pancetta', 'large eggs', 'heavy cream', 'grated pecorino cheese', 'zucchini blossoms, for topping']
ingredients with measurement: {'frozen puff pastry, thawed': '1', 'medium zucchini, chopped': '3-4', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'cubed bacon or pancetta': '1/2', 'large eggs': '3', 'heavy cream': '1/2', 'grated pecorino cheese': '1/2', 'zucchini blossoms, for topping': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees. Grease a 9-inch tart pan with a little butter or oil, then dust it with flour until well coated.', '2. Roll out the puff pastry into a large circle and drape it over the tart pan. Press the pastry into the nooks and crannies, then roll a rolling-pin over the top to cut away the excess pastry. Cover the pastry with a sheet of parchment paper and fill it with baking beans or weights. Set the pan in the oven and bake for 15 minutes, until dry to the touch. Remove from the oven, discard the parchment paper and baking beans, and bake for 3 to 5 minutes more to crisp up the base.', '3. Meanwhile, roughly slice the zucchini into 1 inch thick rounds. Drizzle the olive oil into a large saucepan, set on medium heat, and add the zucchini and salt. Cook, stirring until the zucchini begin to color very lightly, 3 to 5 minutes. Toss in the pancetta and cook, stirring until the pancetta is crisp, 3 to 5 minutes more.', '4. In a large bowl, whisk the eggs and cream with a fork, then whisk in the cheese. Season with a little salt. Allow the pancetta and zucchini mixture to cool a little (so that  it doesn’t cook the eggs), then add it to the eggs and cheese, and toss well.', '5. Pour the filling into the prepared pastry shell. If using, open the zucchini blossoms very gently and pull out and discard the stamens. Then arrange the flowers on the top of the pie, gently pressing them into the filling. Bake the pie for 20 to 25 minutes, until golden on top. It’s delicious eaten warm from the oven, or at room temperature.']

title: Spring Skillet Roasted Lemon Chicken and Veggies
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'chopped fresh thyme', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'smoked paprika', 'cayenne pepper', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'whole chicken, backbone removed and butterflied*', 'lemons, 1 sliced and 1 for juicing', 'yellow onion, sliced', 'garlic, smashed', 'mixed baby spring potatoes, halved if large', 'dry white wine', 'bunch asparagus ends trimmed', 'marinated artichokes']

title: One Skillet Lemon Butter Chicken and Orzo

ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'chicken breasts or small thighs': '1', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'Meyer or regular lemon, sliced': '1', 'butter': '2', 'garlic, minced or grated': '1', 'orzo pasta': '1', 'white wine': '1/3', 'low sodium chicken broth': '2 1/2', 'kale, roughly torn': '1/2', 'juice of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'chopped fresh dill': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F.', '2. Heat the olive oil in a large dutch oven or cast iron skillet set over medium high heat. Season the chicken all over with salt and pepper. When the oil is shimmering, add the chicken and sear on both sides until golden, about 3-5 minutes per side. Remove the chicken from the skillet.', '3.\xa0To the same skillet, add the butter and lemon slices. Sear the lemon until golden on each side, about 1 minute. Remove the lemon from the pan and add to the plate with the chicken.', '4. To the same skillet, add the garlic and orzo. Cook until the garlic is fragrant and the orzo toasted, about 2-3 minutes. Add the wine to the skillet and de-glaze the pan. Add the chicken broth, kale, and lemon juice. Bring to a boil over high heat and stir. Slide the chicken, lemon slices, and any juices left on the pan back into the skillet.\xa0Transfer to the oven and roast, uncovered for 15 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through.', '4. Serve the chicken topped with fresh dill and lemon zest. EAT!']

title: Homemade Vegetable Potstickers with Toasted Sesame Honey Soy Sauce
ingredients: ['sesame oil', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'shiitake mushrooms, chopped', 'shredded cabbage', 'shredded carrots', 'low sodium soy sauce or tamari', 'chopped fresh chives', 'toasted sesame seeds', 'wonton wrappers', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'rice vinegar', 'toasted sesame oil', 'Gochujang (Korean chili paste) or chili sauce', 'low sodium soy sauce or tamari', 'honey']
ingredients with measurement: {'sesame oil': '2', 'fresh ginger, grated': '1', 'shiitake mushrooms, chopped': '8', 'shredded cabbage': '1', 'shredded carrots': '1', 'low sodium soy sauce or tamari': '2', 'chopped fresh chives': '2', 'toasted sesame seeds': '2', 'wonton wrappers': '36-40', 'garlic, minced or grated': '1', 'rice vinegar': '1/3', 'toasted sesame oil': '1/4', 'Gochujang (Korean chili paste) or chili sauce': '1-2', 'honey': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Heat 1 tablespoon sesame oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the mushroom, cabbage, carrots, and ginger. Cook, stirring occasionally until the veggies have cooked down, about 5 minutes. Add the soy sauce, chives, and sesame seeds and cook another 2-3 minutes or until all the liquid has evaporated. Remove from the heat and let cool.', '2. To assemble, spoon 1 tablespoon of filling onto each wrapper. Brush water around the edge of the wrapper.\xa0Fold the dough over the filling to create a half moon shape, pinching the edges to seal. Repeat with the remaining wrappers.', '2. To assemble, spoon 1 tablespoon of filling onto each wrapper. Brush water around the edge of the wrapper.', 'Fold the dough over the filling to create a half moon shape, pinching the edges to seal. Repeat with the remaining wrappers.', '3. Heat a large skillet with the remaining sesame oil over medium-high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the potstickers and cook until the bottoms are light golden brown, about 2-3 minutes. Pour 1/4 cup of water into the pan and immediately cover with a tight fitting lid. Turn heat to medium and let the dumplings steam for 3 minutes. Serve immediately with sauce (se below).', '4. To make the sauce, whisk together all ingredients in a bowl.']

title: Easiest Tomato Basil Penne with Spicy Italian Chickpeas
ingredients: ['chickpeas, drained and rinsed', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'smoked paprika', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'fennel seeds', 'mustard seeds', 'onion powder', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'san marzano tomatoes', 'basil pesto, homemade or store bought', 'penne', 'burrata cheese, torn', 'basil, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'chickpeas, drained and rinsed': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'smoked paprika': '2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1-2', 'fennel seeds': '1', 'mustard seeds': '1', 'onion powder': '1', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'san marzano tomatoes': '2', 'basil pesto, homemade or store bought': '1/2', 'penne': '1', 'burrata cheese, torn': '8', 'basil, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Heat a large pot over medium high heat, add the chickpeas, olive oil, paprika, crushed red pepper flakes, fennel, mustard seeds, onion powder, and a pinch of salt. Toss well to evenly combine. Cook, stirring often until the chickpeas are warmed through and golden crisp, about 5 minutes. Remove the chickpeas from the pot to a plate and set aside.', '2. To the same pot, add the tomatoes - crushing them by hand as you add them, add the pesto, and a large pinch each of salt and pepper. Bring to a simmer over medium heat, cook stirring occasionally, until the sauce thickens slightly, about 10-15 minutes.', '3. Meanwhile, bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the pasta according\xa0to packages directions until al dente. Drain and then toss the pasta in the red sauce.', '4. Divide the pasta among bowls. Top with chickpeas and burrata. Garnish with basil.']

title: Lemon Roasted Broccoli Whole Wheat Pizza

instructions: ['1. Preheat oven to 425 degrees F. Grease a baking sheet with olive oil.', '2. On a lightly floured surface, push/roll the dough out until it is very thin. For SUPER thin pizza, divide the dough into two, and roll out. Transfer the dough to the prepared baking sheet. Spread the dough with pesto. Add the sun-dried tomatoes, olives, lemon zest, crushed red pepper flakes, and mozzarella.', '3. Drizzle the broccoli with 1 tablespoon of oil from the sun-dried tomatoes. Remove the pizza from the oven and top with microgreens. EAT!']

title: Quick Cleansing Kale and Mushroom Pho.
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'shiitake mushrooms, sliced', 'onion, quartered', 'garlic, smashed', 'ginger, sliced in half', 'star anise', 'cinnamon sticks', 'whole cloves', 'beef bone broth', 'fish sauce', 'chili paste', 'bunch Tuscan kale, roughly torn', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'rice noodles', 'sirloin steak or London broil, sliced thinly', 'bean sprouts, mint, basil, chile peppers, green onions, carrots, and limes, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1', 'shiitake mushrooms, sliced': '4', 'onion, quartered': '1', 'garlic, smashed': '4', 'ginger, sliced in half': '1', 'star anise': '2', 'cinnamon sticks': '2', 'whole cloves': '5', 'beef bone broth': '8', 'fish sauce': '1', 'chili paste': '1', 'bunch Tuscan kale, roughly torn': '1', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'rice noodles': '4-8', 'sirloin steak or London broil, sliced thinly': '1/2', 'bean sprouts, mint, basil, chile peppers, green onions, carrots, and limes, for serving': 'seasoning'}

title: French Onion Potato Soup

instructions: ['1. Melt the butter in a large soup pot over medium-high heat. Add the onions, garlic and brown sugar and cook about 10 minutes, stirring frequently, until softened. Continue cooking, stirring often, until the onions are deep golden in color and caramelized, 15 minutes. During the last 5 minutes of cooking, stir in the potatoes.', '1. Melt the butter in a large soup pot over medium-high heat. Add the onions, garlic and brown sugar and cook about 10 minutes, stirring frequently, until softened. Continue cooking, stirring often, until the onions are deep golden in color and caramelized, 15 minutes. During the last 5 minutes of cooking, stir in the potatoes.', '2. Reduce the heat to low and sprinkle the flour over the onions and potatoes, stirring for 3-5 minutes, until the raw flour taste is eliminated. Add the wine, beef broth, Worcestershire sauce, bay leaves, and thyme. Increase the heat to medium-high and return the soup to a simmer, simmer for 20 minutes or until the potatoes are fork tender. Remove the thyme sprigs and bay leaves from the soup. Season, to taste with salt and pepper.', '4. Preheat the broiler to high.', '5. Ladle the soup into oven safe bowls.
